iree_add_all_subdirs()

iree_cc_library(
  NAME
    defs
  INCLUDES
    "$<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src>"
    "$<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/src>"
  PUBLIC
)

iree_compiler_register_plugin(
  PLUGIN_ID
    hal_target_aiunite
  TARGET
    ::aiunite
)

iree_cc_library(
  NAME
    aiunite
  SRCS
    "src/PluginRegistration.cpp"
  DEPS
    ::Transforms
    ::defs
    MLIRIR
    iree::compiler::PluginAPI
  PUBLIC
)

iree_cc_library(
  NAME
    Transforms
  HDRS
    "src/aiunite/Transforms/Passes.h"
    "src/aiunite/Transforms/Passes.h.inc"

    "src/aiunite/Transforms/QueryPartition.cpp"

    ::PassesIncGen
    ::defs
    iree::compiler::Dialect::HAL::IR
    iree::compiler::Dialect::HAL::IR::HALDialect

)

    PassesIncGen
